short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to a New Era of Browsing Efficiency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hasty Math isn’t just another Chrome extension; it’s your digital decluttering tool, designed to streamline your online experience. Say goodbye to digital chaos and hello to focused productivity with every new tab. ✨

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing Hasty Math extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in Terms of Service https://hastymath.com/tos.html and Privacy Policy https://hastymath.com/privacy-policy.html

Features at a Glance:

🧮 Calculator - Your Quick Math Buddy: Need to do a quick calculation? Our simple, no-frills calculator is just a click away, ready to handle your everyday math needs.

📝 Straightforward To-Do List - Organise in a Snap: Keep your daily tasks in check with an easy-to-use to-do list. It’s your straightforward approach to staying organised and on track.

📅 Simple Calendar - View Your Day at a Glance: Our calendar provides a clear view of your days and weeks. It’s perfect for a quick reference to your schedule without any complications.

🔍📚 Efficient Search & Bookmarks - Your Web Essentials: Find your favourite websites faster. With a dedicated search box and a neatly arranged bookmarks section on the left, accessing the web is smoother than ever.

🌿 Clean and Uncluttered Design - Enjoy a distraction-free environment. Our clean background ensures your focus remains on productivity, offering a breath of fresh air with each new tab.

Hasty Math is all about making your online experience more efficient, less cluttered, and pleasantly simple. It’s not just a tool; it’s a statement of simplicity and focus in the digital age.🚀
